help.name: AntsN4BiasFieldCorrectionFs
help.description: Runs N4 (nonparameteric, nonuniform normalization) retrospective bias correction on an image. This programs wraps the AntsN4BiasFieldCorrection utility available in the ANTs package (see http://stnava.github.io/ANTs).

optional-flagged.explanation: Resample factor to decrease computation time. Default is 4.
Number of resolutions and max iterations per resolution. Default is `50 50 50 50`, which indicates 4 fitting levels with 50 iterations each.
Corrected output datatype. Can be float, uchar, or int. Default is float.
Replace 0s with offset + scale*rand(). Values will be remasked in the output if remask=1.
Rescale so that voxels in the seg have a mean of targetval.
Rescale so that voxels in the seg have a mean of targetval but do not perform bias correction (only rescale)
